user_interest.availabilities.description: List of availabilities for the user interest.

user_interest.launched_to_all.description: Indicates if this user interest is launched to all users.

user_interest.resource_name.description: Resource name of the user interest.

user_interest.taxonomy_type.description: Type of taxonomy associated with the user interest.

user_interest.user_interest_id.description: Unique identifier for the user interest.

user_interest.user_interest_parent.description: Parent user interest if this interest is a subcategory.
